name: dib eat banana
description:
This game was found in the bargain bin of a Salvos in outer Melbourne. It is rumoured that upon buying it, the original owner immediately died in a fiery car crash with a fruit truck. Dib Eat Banana was originally released for the Dyson Airblade Polycarbonate Ab14-G in 1983 and hit with critical acclaim from underground clandestine gaming communities before fading into obscurity. This game is rarely seen on sale anywhere, but often goes for over $10000 on collector sites. A team of rabid fanatics decided to port this game to the pico-8 engine in late 2022. 

DO NOT play this game.
